title: Woman jaywalking injured by hit-and-run driver 5 hours ago
content: SAN ANTONIO - A woman jaywalking late Friday night was hit by a driver who fled the scene.    Authorities were called to the 5900 block of South Flores Street at about 10:30 p.m. for reports of an accident involving a pedestrian. Police said the woman was crossing the street without using a crosswalk, when a pick-up truck struck her and fled the scene. She was taken to the hospital with multiple injuries.    Traffic officials are investigating.
